titles.title: Medicare Mental Health Inpatient Equity Act of 2021
Medicare Mental Health Inpatient Equity Act of 2021
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the 190-day lifetime limit on inpatient psychiatric hospital services under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Medicare Mental Health Inpatient Equity Act of 2021
This bill removes the 190-day lifetime limit on inpatient psychiatric hospital services under Medicare.
